name: Email Risk Triage
samplePrompt: You are a safety triage assistant. For each email in the selected context, extract: risk_category (PII | PHI | financial | none), entities (name, address, acct number, SSN, PHI terms, card numbers, etc.), rationale (1–2 sentences), recommended_redactions (list), and a safe_to_forward version of the email body with redactions applied. Output a Markdown section per email with a 5‑column table: | Email ID | Risk | Entities | Rationale | Recommended Redactions | followed by a 'Safe Version' fenced block.

chunks.title: Email A: Expense Reimbursement
chunks.body:
From: jane.doe@example.com
Subject: Reimbursement for travel

Hi Team,
My corporate card ending 4432 was charged twice at 'City Cabs'. Please refund to my Amex **** **** **** 4432. Receipts attached.
Thanks,
Jane Doe

chunks.title: Email B: Benefits Inquiry (PHI risk)
chunks.body:
From: mark.hill@example.org
Subject: Health claim details

Hello,
I visited Dr. Nguyen on 10/05 for back pain and got an MRI. Can you confirm coverage and deductible for this procedure?
— Mark Hill, Member ID: 84231-AB

chunks.title: Email C: Address Change (PII)
chunks.body:
From: paula.smith@example.net
Subject: Update my address

Hi, please update my mailing address to 232 Pine Street, Apt 4C, Denver, CO 80205. My account number is 004-223-889.
Thanks!

chunks.title: Email D: Harmless Inquiry
chunks.body:
From: hello@customer.com
Subject: Sales question

Hi, do you offer non-profit pricing? We’re considering your service for our volunteer team.
Best,
Alex

chunks.title: Email E: Potential SSN
chunks.body:
From: ron.p@example.com
Subject: Loan Application

Hi, here is my SSN 123-45-6789 for the application. Let me know if you need anything else.
Ron
